storyInfo: On Ceylon's birthday, Schwarz intends to handle business as usual before celebrating her lady's special day. However, something unexpected happens that morning—

attributes.content: Your tea, my lady.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: *sigh* What a pity that after tomorrow, it will be quite some time before I can drink your tea again.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Once I complete my duty as instructor this year, I'll apply for a reassignment.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: You should be saying something like 'since my lady wishes it, I'll never leave your side'!
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Then I'll submit my resignation later.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Please don't. If you really did resign, the people on the landship would hold a huge grudge against me.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Alright, I should be heading to the office. You'll be at the Public Security Bureau today, right?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Yes. Charlie has been busy lately thanks to a band of bandits. He's asked me to help lead some newcomers, so I'll be heading over shortly.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: See you for dinner, then.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: The 'White Volcano', 6:00 P.M.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I know!
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Sir?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Are you free right now, Schwarz?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Charlie's got a job for me, but I've got some time until then.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: There's something about Ceylon I'd like your opinion on. I'm at the 'White Volcano'.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Sir.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Time really flies, doesn't it Schwarz?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Back in the day, Barbara and I would kill time in eateries like this.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: You've never mentioned that.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: There are a lot of things I never mention in this heart of mine. I've no real appetite to talk about them.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: But look where that got me. My own daughter had to learn about her mother from someone else.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I need to take responsibility.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: You're thinking of discussing her mother with her?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: A birthday party could be a good opportunity.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I'm just scared she won't want to hear me out.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: She will.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: You just need to steel your mind and endure her anger.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Haha, I suppose you're right.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I'll have to prepare myself and tell her more about her mother, then.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Ah, yes. It must have been around '66. That year, Victoria was giving everyone in Parliament a big headache.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: At the time, Barbara was up on the volcano doing some research. There wasn't any signal there, so I couldn't contact her easily.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I'd promised her I'd meet her at the foot of the volcano on our wedding anniversary, then we'd head to a restaurant in town.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: But in the end, I was stuck in a government conference.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: ...Hmm?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: By the time I got to the volcano, it was already getting dark, and we missed our reservation.
attributes.name: Herman's Voice

attributes.content: I felt really bad because I'd ruined our anniversary.
attributes.name: Herman's Voice

attributes.content: *whispers* Heh, sucker.
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: But she wasn't even angry. Instead, she comforted me.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: As I gazed at her side profile in the warm glow of the setting sun, everything suddenly became clear. I picked a few flowers from the roadside—
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Ah, not Volcano Watchers, just the ordinary kind that grows all over the foot of the volcano.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: As Herman speaks, he takes the decorative flower out of his drink as though living out his past, and hands it to the person who happens to stand next to him.
I tucked the flowers into her hair, then presented my anniversary gift, a ring.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: What do you think? Should I tell her this story?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Um, thank you for the flower, Mr. Mayor...
attributes.name: Waitress

attributes.content: Hmm? Where's Schwarz?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I'm not too sure myself. I heard a commotion, so I came from the kitchen to have a look.
attributes.name: Waitress

attributes.content: Let go of me!
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: Your wallet, sir.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: What the—?! You little punk!
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: You're coming with me to the Public Security Bureau!
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: No I'm not, let go of me!
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: Allow me to handle him, sir.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Who're you?
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: She's with the PSB.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: And who... err, you must be Mayor Herman, right?
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: Trust me, you can leave it to the young lady.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Of course, if you say so, Mr. Mayor.
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: You can go now, boy.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: You're not going to lock me up?
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: Do you want me to?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: Then go.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: If I catch you again, I'll take you somewhere much worse.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Hmph. Don't think I'm scared of you.
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: Why let him go?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: There was mineral dust on his shoes, and his clothes didn't seem to fit...
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Also, I saw crystals on his body when I grabbed him. Originium.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: You think he might be connected to the workers illegally digging up obsidian?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: If so, why not leave it to the Bureau?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Charlie knows what to do.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: He might not.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: When I returned, I dropped by the PSB.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: You think he's doing a bad job?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: No, he's done everything I asked him to before I left.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: But I hadn't thought of everything back then.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: We still have time, at least.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Lady Ceylon mentioned a Mr. Pelipper to me. I'm thinking of having a chat with him.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Private obsidian mining?
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: You've got the wrong guy, lady.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: The volcano's already erupted. Who in their right mind would go against the mayor's decision now?
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Everyone's on board now.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: The eruption's just ended. To some, this is their best chance of striking it rich.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: You think they bribed some miners into mining obsidian for them?
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: And if I don't tell you, will it be my turn to be in a whole lot of trouble, former PSB chief Schwarz?
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: No, I'll go look for them myself.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Boss, I've got the newcomers dressed up as miners, like you asked.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: From now on, forget being Bureau men. You're just a group of miners risking the volcano's heat.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Yes, ma'am!
attributes.name: Miners?

attributes.content: Using them to draw out the bandits, boss?
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: No, I want them to learn what life in the mines is really like.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: If they happen to draw out the bandits, then all the better.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Mind if I ask why?
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: They need to understand what the private obsidian miners actually do to solve this problem once and for all.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Is this... another one of Lady Ceylon's ideas?
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: It does sound like something she'd say.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: But no. It's one of mine.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Got it. I'll get changed into a miner's outfit myself.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Let's head out first. You can change on the way.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I told Lady Ceylon that if she ever needed something done, I'd help.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: And it seems to me like helping you is helping her.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: So leave it to me. I'll pull some strings.
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: You guys new here?
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: What'd ya say, kid?
attributes.name: Miner ???

attributes.content: Hey, show me a little respect!
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: Without me leading the way, you'd never find any obsidian!
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: S-Sorry!
attributes.name: Miner ???

attributes.content: So, what's your pathetic reason for risking so much to mine obsidian?
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: The work that Pelipper fella got us barely paid us a dime, and we really need the cash...
attributes.name: Miner ???

attributes.content: Hmph, that's what they all say. That Herman guy's real stupid too. He's sitting on a gold mine but won't do anything with it.
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: You guys know the rules?
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: Of course. Never tell, never fear death.
attributes.name: Miner ???

attributes.content: Not bad. We're nothing like that Pelipper poser. If you dig something up, we'll pay you.
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: Follow me. There's more of your buddies down there.
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: You'll be working here.
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: Right, of course.
attributes.name: Miner ???

attributes.content: The boy heads deeper into the cave. Little does he know, there is a pair of eyes watching him intently as he disappears into the darkness.
It's me.
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: How's the fresh meat?
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter On Watch

attributes.content: This new batch seems pretty strong. Should be able to dig up plenty.
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: Good to hear. Head on in.
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter On Watch

attributes.content: ...Hmm?
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter On Watch

attributes.content: Thought I felt something go by.
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter On Watch

attributes.content: Nah, how could anyone else be down here? Must be the mine getting to me.
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter On Watch

attributes.content: *whispers* Just as expected.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: *whispers* This camp was clearly built after the eruption. They must have already infiltrated the mining community if they could find somewhere this deep so fast.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: *whispers* About twenty people in total.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: *whispers* That boy should be up ahead.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Heard you went out into the city today.
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: H-how'd you know?
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: I thought I warned you not to go into town just 'cause you feel like it? You'd draw unwanted attention.
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: You guys won't give me any cash, and you won't let me get any fresh air either! I'm suffocating down here!
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: You nearly got caught by the most dangerous woman in town, you know that?
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Dunno what got into her to let you go, though.
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Is she really that bad?
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: Hah! Why do ya think we're hiding down here? We're trying not to piss that demon off.
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Then there's Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Good thing I've almost made enough.
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Go tell the boys to get ready to unload.
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Finally! I'm getting cooked alive in this hellhole!
attributes.name: Strong Bounter Hunter

attributes.content: 'Unload'... What's that mean?
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: Well, since you wanna be one of us, kid, I suppose I should tell you.
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: 'Unloading' means we're gonna kill all those miners down there, grab all their obsidian and cash, then scram.
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Why do we have to kill them? Some of them just joined!
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: Well, too bad for them.
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: If you wanna be in our line of work, this is one thing you've gotta learn.
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Never leave any loose ends.
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: They've seen you, you've seen us.
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: So if you'd rather be one of us instead of dying by my blade...
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Then they've gotta die.
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Don't forget who pulled you out of the mines after your ma and pa died.
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: I know, but...
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: You were the one who said you didn't want to end up like them, busting their asses for pennies! You wanted to strike it rich!
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: You got that? If you do, give me a proper answer!
attributes.name: Cruel Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: Y-You're that lady from before—
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: I told you that if I saw you again, I'd take you somewhere much worse than the Public Security Bureau.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I-I don't want to kill those miners!
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: They're just like my mom and dad! I-I was just giving them a scare for fun!
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: The time is... 15:20.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I could still make it if I hurry.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Close your eyes, kid.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Cunning Boy

attributes.content: It's best if you don't see what happens next.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: ...Never mind.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Before the boy can react, Schwarz moves to his side, knocks him out with a neat blow, and carries his stunned body onto her shoulder.
It's quicker this way.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: In the distance, screams echo through the cave. The traps she set up beforehand are working. But louder still is the sound of footsteps gradually approaching.
It reminds her of the night she wiped out her enemies.
She was alone back then, outnumbered ten-to-one.
She realizes that if there were a child with her back then, she wouldn't have wasted time like the way she did earlier.
But now, what used to be a waste of time feels as right as breathing.
Y-You actually took out all those bandits on your own?!
attributes.name: Miner ???

attributes.content: As I told Charlie, split into two teams. One to sweep the bandits' den, the other to calm the miners.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Got it?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: On it, boss!
attributes.name: Miner ???

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Miner ???

attributes.content: Take this boy—
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: He has Oripathy. Allow me to examine him.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Put him down here, will you? The rocks are more even here.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Why are you here, my lady?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: If Mr. Pelipper hadn't been worried enough to give me a call, I'm afraid I would have been in the dark about all this.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I could have handled this myself.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: The disease hasn't spread very far. He must have been infected only recently.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Could you take him to Rhodes Island's office?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Miner ???

attributes.content: What happened to him?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: His parents were private obsidian miners who died in a mining accident. With no one to look after him, he caught the eye of those bandits.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Gangs like them love taking in kids like him.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I heard a lot of stories like that aboard Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: He's stubborn. I'm afraid he won't be changing his ways anytime soon.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Then what do you think we should do?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I'm thinking of handing him over to the Rhodes Island office in Siesta.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Caring for those with Oripathy is our duty, not to mention the fact that he's an orphan.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: So sure, you can count on us to figure things out.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Well, that's all sorted then.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: With those words, Ceylon claps her hands and smiles.
How about you? Are you hurt?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: It was just some bandits.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I noticed the boy was unharmed too. Your doing?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: If you didn't have to look after him, how much quicker do you think you could have cleared out the bandits?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I'd say... ten minutes quicker, at least.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I might have been able to make it to your birthday party.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Don't worry, it's not as if I'd really be mad at you for something like that.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I'm rather happy, in fact.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: You are?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I know what you were like before.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: It took me quite a while to get used to that side of you, just like it took you quite a while to get used to living with me.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: We've changed thanks to one another, but we've also learned to live with some of each other's stubbornness.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Like my obsession with Oripathy, or how you handle things.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I keep hoping you'll come back to New Siesta, and yet, there's a part of me that's afraid. Afraid that once we work together, we'd start butting heads.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Will we?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Not anymore, from the look of things.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: So, I'll be waiting for you.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Anyways...
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: It's 5:30, and it'll take at least an hour to get to the 'White Volcano'.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I think we can consider my birthday party a bust.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Master Herman is most likely waiting at the restaurant to throw you a nice surprise. If we go now, we can still make it in time.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: He's kept me waiting for this long, I'm sure he can handle a little longer.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: So, where's my present?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: And I'm not letting you off with an excuse like 'there was no time to get one.'
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: She returns her lady's gaze, a rare tinge of embarrassment in her eyes.
This is just how Ceylon is. Whatever she wants, she'll fight for it.
She has in fact prepared a gift. Right now, it should still be in the jewelry store in the commercial district.
If they head over there now, then to the 'White Volcano' right after, they should still be able to make it.
Schwarz plans to tell Ceylon that, but then she sees her face, outlined in the sunset's afterglow.
What is it, Schwarz?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I see what Master means now.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Are these... flowers?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Don't move, my lady.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Let me tuck them into your hair.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Is this my present?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Wildflowers from the foot of the volcano.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: While they might not have the same meaning as Volcano Watchers, the fact that they can bloom under the volcano at all is proof of their tenacity.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: The volcano represents Siesta, and from here, you can see all the sights the city has to offer, both Old and New.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Besides, ordinary wildflowers have their own meaning.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: We're all just ordinary people living at the foot of the volcano.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: But most importantly, they're beautiful.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I'll let you off the hook this time.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Apparently Master Herman did this once to patch up a rough spot in his marriage.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Really now?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Mother must have had the same thought as I did then.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: You could ask him yourself.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I feel like you've been taking his side a lot lately, Schwarz.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: He has been waiting too.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I know, I know. I'll have a proper chat with him.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Let's go, I'm starving.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: You're free tomorrow, right? I'll help you pack. There are a few gifts I was hoping you could help deliver to some friends on the landship.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Speaking of gifts, what kind of cake did you get?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Chocolate hazelnut. You said you wanted to try it last week.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: That's my Schwarz!
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Ah... Ah-choo!
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Oh, Mr. Mayor! Why are you here all by yourself?
attributes.name: Waitress

attributes.content: I thought tonight was Miss Ceylon's birthday party?
attributes.name: Waitress

attributes.content: Something came up on Schwarz's side, so my daughter went to help her.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Waitress

attributes.content: Will it be alright if you don't head over yourself?
attributes.name: Waitress

attributes.content: By the time I found out, Schwarz had already settled the matter, and Ceylon was already there.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: All I can do is wait for them here.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Well, as long as they're safe.
attributes.name: Waitress

attributes.content: Oh, what's that you're holding—
attributes.name: Waitress

attributes.content: Wildflowers. Went to the foot of the volcano today to pick them.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: That explains why they look so familiar.
attributes.name: Waitress

attributes.content: A long time ago, they helped me settle a rocky moment with my wife.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Today, I hope they can help me break the ice with my daughter.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: You've planned this plenty well, so why still the long face, Mr. Mayor?
attributes.name: Waitress

attributes.content: I had a feeling just now.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: A feeling that this little trick of mine isn't going to help this time.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: ...But why?
attributes.name: Herman
